steps.title: Draw a stick figure.
steps.content: Draw a stick figure. This will serve as the base pose for your Leprechaun.

steps.title: Sketch shapes (as shown) and then add guidelines.
steps.content: Sketch shapes (as shown) and then add guidelines. Remember that leprechauns are small and almost elf-like in nature—try to depict that in your proportions.

steps.title: Sketch in the facial features.
steps.content: Sketch in the facial features. Remember that leprechauns usually have a beard and elf-like ears.

steps.title: Sketch green clothes and hat and a pipe.
steps.content: Sketch green clothes and hat and a pipe. Draw the body as shown.

steps.title: Outline the whole image in permanent media (like ink or paint).
steps.content: Outline the whole image in permanent media (like ink or paint). Make sure to erase all of your guidelines.

steps.title: Color your illustration and you're done!
steps.content: Color your illustration and you're done! Add in a pot of gold and a rainbow if desired.

steps.title: Start by sketching the head.
steps.content: Start by sketching the head. Draw a circle in the center of the page. Inside the circle, draw two perpendicular lines—one going vertically and one going horizontally.

steps.title: Draw a flat oval on top of the head.
steps.content: Draw a flat oval on top of the head. Add a truncated cone on top of the circle. This will be the hat.

steps.title: Draw a semicircle under the head.
steps.content: Draw a semicircle under the head. It should connect with the bottom of the hat. This will be the beard. Then, on each upper side of the semicircle draw a small pointy arch shape.

steps.title: Draw a circle with no top under the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle with no top under the head. This will be the body.

steps.title: Sketch arms and hands.
steps.content: Sketch arms and hands. Position them as if the leprechaun is showing you something.

steps.title: Sketch a small pot in the right arm.
steps.content: Sketch a small pot in the right arm. To draw, draw a circle with a ring around it. You can also add handles if you wish.

steps.title: Draw a "U" with a square bottom below the body.
steps.content: Draw a "U" with a square bottom below the body. This will make the pants.

steps.title: Outline the shape and add details.
steps.content: Outline the shape and add details.
